name: SiebelReview: Custom BC Based On S_PARTY Table Missing the "Inner Join Extension Table" User Property
description: The rule reports the custom Business Components based on S_PARTY table does not have the "Inner Join Extension Table" user property defined.
output: This rule reports all Business Components without the User Property "Inner Join Extension Table"
rationale:
If this user property is not defined, Business Components based on S_PARTY table may not work properly.
For example, without this user property, the correct base table, and corresponding de-normalized information cannot be loaded.
Therefore, de-normalized columns (such as columns in S_ORG_BU, S_ACCNT_POSTN, S_POSTN_CON and others) are not updated when creating a new record.
The bottom line is data corruption in Siebel repository.
remediation:
“Inner Join Extension Table” must be used when a new Business Component that is based on the “Party Model” is created. This user property defines one or more tables that are implicitly joined to the S_PARTY base table.

This user property can be specified with a number appended. For a given Business Component, the value associated with the property that has the lowest number is the primary extension table. 

For example, for the standard “Employee” Business Component, “Inner Join Extension Table 1” has value S_CONTACT, “Inner Join Extension Table 2” has value S_USER and “Inner Join Extension Table 3” has value S_EMP_PER. Three extension tables are specified, of which S_CONTACT is the primary extension table.
total: Number of added or modified Business Components based on S_PARTY
alternativeName: SiebelReview: Custom BC Based On S_PARTY Table Missing the "Inner Join Extension Table" User Property
